title: The Reformation
description: The Phoenix Project Book IIThis is the Reformation.This is the plan: fracture society and build it anew.Andromeda Somers has just been sent to The Pasture to recover from her attempted escape out of the Phoenix District. Now, she watches as hundreds of missiles descend upon the United States.Andie has just witnessed the dawn of a new age.With all hopes of escape demolished, Andie fights to protect her daughter from whatever the Funding Entities have in store for the future.
author: M.R. Pritchard
